name: set_animation
description: Makes the <%=class_name%> play an animation from its associated animation file.

If there is no animation in the file with an exactly-matching name exists, the <%=class_name%> will be stuck in an undefined state until it is forced into another state from an external source (e.g. getting hit).

parameters.name: animation_name
parameters.desc: The name of the animation you want the <%=class_name%> to play.
